description.part1: I was fascinated by the world of technology from an early age, especially the connection between people and digital innovation.
description.part2: After several years of self-employment, during which I supported companies with digital challenges and continue to do so, I decided to embark on a new path: medical informatics and digital medicine.
description.part3: Today, I am conducting research and continuing my education in this forward-looking field, at the interface of technology, medicine, and research. My goal is to design digital systems that are not only efficient but also humane. With my experience in IT practice and my passion for the digital health world, I want to build bridges between modern technology and real medical benefits.
